scripts.install: npm run install:library && npm run install:service
scripts.install:service: cd packages/polyfill-service && npm install --save ../polyfill-library && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.ci: npm run ci:library && npm run ci:service
scripts.ci:library: cd packages/polyfill-library && npm install && npm link && cd ../..
scripts.ci:service: cd packages/polyfill-service && npm link polyfill-library && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.ci:whitesource: cd packages/polyfill-service && npm run whitesource && cd ../..
